sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_759224_magic_c_0_mtg_cards"> <x_759224_magic_c_0_mtg_cards action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <api_link>https://api.scryfall.com/cards/87b71b08-668c-4b32-8243-8def1a9acf26</api_link> <back_image/> <cmc>4</cmc> <collector_number>41</collector_number> <colors>B,R,U</colors> <edhrec>https://edhrec.com/route/?cc=Mairsil%2C+the+Pretender</edhrec> <face_one_artist>Izzy</face_one_artist> <face_one_colors>B,R,U</face_one_colors> <face_one_flavor_text/> <face_one_loyalty/> <face_one_mana_cost>{1}{U}{B}{R}</face_one_mana_cost> <face_one_oracle_text>When Mairsil, the Pretender enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact or creature card from your hand or graveyard and put a cage counter on it. Mairsil, the Pretender has all activated abilities of all cards you own in exile with cage counters on them. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.</face_one_oracle_text> <face_one_power>4</face_one_power> <face_one_produced_mana/> <face_one_toughness>4</face_one_toughness> <face_two_artist/> <face_two_colors/> <face_two_flavor_text/> <face_two_loyalty/> <face_two_mana_cost/> <face_two_oracle_text/> <face_two_power/> <face_two_toughness/> <face_two_type_line/> <foiling>foil</foiling> <front_image>https://cards.scryfall.io/normal/front/8/7/87b71b08-668c-4b32-8243-8def1a9acf26.jpg?1704575313</front_image> <gatherer>https://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=433282&printed=false</gatherer> <is_multi_faced>false</is_multi_faced> <keywords/> <name>Mairsil, the Pretender</name> <number/> <owner display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</owner> <p_price>0</p_price> <price>0.46</price> <price_change>0.46</price_change> <pt_price>0</pt_price> <quantity>1</quantity> <rarity>mythic</rarity> <reserved_list>false</reserved_list> <sets display_value="c17">8cd8b56347c502102dbef1f4116d4354</sets> <sys_class_name>x_759224_magic_c_0_mtg_cards</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-03-26 15:58:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1de664bb470542102dbef1f4116d43d0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-03-26 15:58:02</sys_updated_on> <total_price>0.46</total_price> <type_line>Legendary Creature â€” Human Wizard</type_line> </x_759224_magic_c_0_mtg_cards> </record_update>
